mapper.select: select send_info_id as sendInfoId, ageing as ageing, send_time as sendTime, business_type as businessType, status as status, content as content, signa_ture as signaTure, success as success from msm where 1=1 and send_info_id = #{sendInfoId}
select send_info_id as sendInfoId, user_name as userName, phone as phone, success as success from msm_info where 1=1 and send_info_id = #{sendInfoId}
mapper.insert: insert into msm ( send_info_id, ageing, send_time, create_time, create_by, remark, status, content, send_count, signa_ture, success )VALUES( #{sendInfoId}, #{ageing}, #{sendTime}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{content}, #{sendCount}, #{signaTure}, #{success} )
insert into msm_info ( send_info_id, user_name, success, phone )VALUES( #{sendInfoId}, #{userName}, #{success}, #{phone} )
mapper.select: select id as id, send_info_id as sendInfoId, user_name as userName, phone as phone, ageing as ageing, send_time as sendTime, business_type as businessType, status as status, content as content, send_count as sendCount, fail_count as failCount, signa_ture as signaTure, success as success from msm where 1=1 AND success = '0' AND status = #{status} order by id desc
mapper.update: update msm set status="1" where id=#{id}
